item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-05-28
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Although I've never had an issue with Lynch's Dune, I can see how the average person would have no idea with what's going on. #
  • RT @newsweek BP's Photo Blockade of the Gulf Oil Spill #
  • RT @GadgetLab 7 Key Turning Points That Made Apple No. 1 #
  • First to drop off Sonoma then New York City! #
  • I'm at Charlton Service Plaza(Westbound) (Mile Post 84 Massachusetts Turnpike, btw exit 10 & 9, Charlton). #
  • Check us out on the Shake Shack cam! I'm wearing shorts. #
  • I'm at Shake Shack (Madison Ave & 23rd St, at SE Edge of Madison Square Park, New York) w/ 8 others. #
  • I'm at Fishs Eddy (889 Broadway, btw 19th St. & 20th St., New York). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
